bilingual.source: He would fant about winning the lottery.
He dreamed that he won the lottery.
He lucked out when he won the lottery.
It was a fluke that he won the lottery.
She is rumoured to have won the lottery.
He won fifty bucks in the lottery.
bilingual.target: 他在彩票中赢了五十美元。
想象自己中彩票的情景。

bilingual.source: He won a lot of money in the lottery.
bilingual.target: 他在彩票中赢了许多钱。

bilingual.source: He bought a lottery ticket every week.
bilingual.target: 他每周都会买一张彩票。

bilingual.source: He won a ten million dollar lottery.
bilingual.target: 他中了一千万美元的彩票。

list.abstract: 乐透，英文lottery(lottery的缩写为lot)，的音译，叫作乐透。英文原指：（发行彩票）抽彩给奖（筹款法）。但乐透只是中国彩票((haobc)的其中一种玩法，而不是彩票的统称。在美国，lottery（彩票）是一种合法的赌博(gambling)形式。

yingyinNormal.en: I got tenure. I didn't win the lottery.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有了续约，但我没有赢彩票。

yingyinNormal.en: He is the boss' son. Come on, lottery! Yeah!
yingyinNormal.zh: 他是老板的儿子。好了，彩票！是啊！

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Well, Monica, suppose one of your special tickets wins? How are you gonna feel when you win the lottery and lose all your friends?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，莫妮卡，假设你的彩票中奖了怎么办？你觉得中了彩票，失去了朋友又怎样？

yingyinNormal.en: Boy, all those years I went to middle school I could've been scratching lottery tickets and chugging Sody Pop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在初中的那些年应该都去买彩票，喝汽水。

yingyinNormal.en: Tough odds. Yeah. If only it were a sure thing like your 24 state lottery. Yeah, look who's coming around!
yingyinNormal.zh: 几率真小。是啊，还真希望能像你们二十四州联合彩票的几率一样高。是啊，瞧瞧谁想通了！

yingyinNormal.en: So after they do this lottery, they pose the sign on this two unions about who are the lucky students, who won the lottery, and who are the unlucky students, who did not win the lottery.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以在抽签过后，他们对这两个群体进行标记记录，哪些是抽中球票的幸运儿，哪些比较倒霉没抽到票。

yingyinNormal.en: I suppose I could wrap up an order of Mee krob and a couple of lottery scratchers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我看我能打包一份脆炸米粉再加一些刮奖券。

yingyinNormal.en: All right. Believe me, if you win the lottery, it's the last you're gonna hear from us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，相信我，如果你们中奖了，你们就跟我们不是朋友了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well essentially, he won the lottery. Backwards or something. And in another world, I'd look like him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可以理解为，他中奖了。坏事落到他的头上了。换个角度来说，我可能也会中。

yingyinNormal.en: And on those cases, at the end of the day there're just too many students who want the tickets, and they do a lottery.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很多时候最终都因为门票供不应求，用抽签的方式来决定谁能获得门票。

yingyinNormal.en: Please. If I win the lottery, you guys are not gonna leave me. Someone gave me a basket of mini muffins last week, and I couldn't get rid of you for three days!
yingyinNormal.zh: 拜托，如果我中奖了，你们才不会离开我，有人上星期给我一堆松饼 害我整整三天都被你们骚扰！

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Spend large sums of money won in <highlight>lotteries</highlight>.
This volume is packed with tips to help wage slaves as well as <highlight>lottery</highlight> winners get the most "happiness bang for your buck."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这本书包含了帮助工薪族和彩票中奖者获得最“物有所值的幸福”的建议。

examination_example.sentence: This is now a question for Gloria MacKenzie, an 84-year-old widow who collected the biggest undivided <highlight>lottery</highlight> jackpot in history.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这现在是格洛丽亚·麦肯齐的问题，她是一位84岁的寡妇，她收集了历史上最大的未分割彩票头奖。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: About 10 percent of students are assigned by <highlight>lottery</highlight> to dual-language classrooms that offer instruction in Spanish, Japanese or Mandarin, alongside English.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大约10%的学生通过抽签被分配到双语教室，除英语外，还提供西班牙语、日语或普通话教学。

examination_example.sentence: I was lucky enough to have my tuition covered by a <highlight>lottery</highlight>-funded scholarship called HOPE (Helping Outstanding Pupils Educationally) When I started college.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我开始上大学的时候，我很幸运地获得了由彩票资助的名为“希望”(在教育上帮助优秀学生)的奖学金。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: We found that for some <highlight>lottery</highlight> (彩票) winners, after six months to a year, they were back to the baseline.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们发现，对于一些中了彩票的人，在六个月到一年后，他们又回到了基准状态。

examination_example.sentence: One of the prizes used was a <highlight>lottery</highlight> ticket (彩票) , and this was effective in persuading people to eat less.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中一个用作奖项的是彩票，这能有效说服人们吃少一些。
